subject: MultiThreadedTestCase
msgSnippet: Hello, I think it would be very useful (at least for me ;-) to add the MultiThreadedTestCase of Andy Schneider (if he agrees f course), in junit.jar. Xavier
messageBody:
Hello,

I think it would be very useful (at least for me ;-) to add the
MultiThreadedTestCase of Andy Schneider (if he agrees f course), in
junit.jar.

Xavier Marjou

PS: for those who do not know this class, cf:
http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-12-2000/jw-1221-junit.html
